title: Gallery Talk: The Accidental History of Iridescence
hero_caption: <p>Tiffany Glass and Decorating Company, American, 1894-1902 or Tiffany Studios, American, 1902-1932. <em>Jack-in-the-Pulpit Vase</em>, 1900/12. Gift of Mr. and Mr …
description:
Louis Comfort Tiffany was inspired to create iridescent art glass after he wondered how the ancient Romans had obtained such a colorful effect on their vessels. Learn what Tiffany discovered about the art of iridescence on this tour of ancient and not-so-ancient past techniques.
